1.desc: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.  If damage is taken from an enemy hero, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.
1.notes: Quick-casting will cause you to teleport towards your fountain.
1.lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.

2.lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.

3.lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.

4.lore: A medium weave of metal chains.

5.lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.

6.lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.

7.desc: Passive: Pierce - Grants a chance to deal bonus damage.
7.attrib:
+ 21 Damage
CHANCE TO PIERCE: 20%
PIERCE DAMAGE: 40
7.lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.

8.lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.

9.lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.

10.lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.

11.desc:
Active: Destroy Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree, or deals 100 damage to a ward.
Passive: Quell - Gives bonus attack damage against non-hero units, based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.
11.attrib:
MELEE BONUS: 32%
RANGED BONUS: 12%
11.lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.

12.lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.

13.lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.

14.lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.

15.lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.

16.lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.

17.lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.

18.lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.

19.lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.

20.lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.

21.lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.

22.lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.

23.lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.

24.lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.

25.lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.

26.desc:
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks.

Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
26.lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.

27.lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.

28.lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.

29.desc: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

30.desc: Passive: True Sight - Gives the ability to see invisible units and wards. Drops on death, but cannot be destroyed.
30.notes:
Disabled while on a courier.
Gives vision in a 1100 radius.

31.desc: Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.
31.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with non-item sources of spell resistance.
31.lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.

32.lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.

33.desc: Use: Instantly restores health and mana.
33.attrib:
HEALTH RESTORED: 2500
MANA RESTORED: 1000
33.lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.

34.desc: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 10) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area.  When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.
34.notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
34.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

36.desc: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 15) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area.  When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.
36.notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
36.attrib:
+ 3 All Attributes
RESTORE PER CHARGE: 15
36.lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.

37.desc: Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form and become unable to attack or be attacked, but take 40% extra magic damage. Using a Teleport Scroll dispels Ghost Form.
37.notes:
Ends if you become magic immune, and will have no effect if you are already magic immune.
Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
37.attrib:
+ 7 All Attributes
GHOST DURATION: 4
INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 40%
37.lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

38.desc: Use: Restores mana on the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
38.lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.

39.desc: Use: Regenerate - Restores HP on the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.
39.lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.

40.desc: Use: Reveal - Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.
40.notes: Places a buff on enemy units in the area that prevents them from becoming invisible.
40.attrib:
DURATION: 12
RADIUS: 1050
SLOW: 15%

41.desc:
Use: Regenerate - Restores HP and Mana over time. Effect is lost if unit is attacked. Empty Bottle refills near town fountain. You can also store runes in the bottle, to save for later use. After 2 minutes, stored Runes will be activated. If Bottle is empty, it causes a courier to move 30% slower.

Hold Control to use your Bottle on an allied hero.
41.attrib:
HEALTH RESTORED: 135
MANA RESTORED: 70
DURATION: 3
41.lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.

42.desc:
Use: Places an Observer Ward to give sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 7 minutes.

Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

43.desc:
Use: Places a Sentry Ward to give True Sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 4 minutes.

Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

44.desc: Use: Eat Tree - Consume a tree to restore HP over time. Comes with 3 charges.
44.lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.

45.desc: Creature that carries items to and from your base.
45.lore: Losing the donkey is punishable by death.

46.desc: Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building.

48.desc:
Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
48.notes: Shares cooldown with Town Portal Scrolls.

50.desc:
Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. Phase is cancelled upon using another item or ability.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
50.attrib:
PHASE DURATION: 4
PHASE MOVE BOOST: 16%
+ 50 Movement Speed
+ 24 Damage
50.lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.

51.lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.

52.lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.

53.lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.

54.lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.

55.lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.

56.lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.

57.lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.

58.lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.

59.lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.

60.lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.

61.lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.

63.desc:
Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.

Power Treads can be built using a Belt of Strength, Band of Elvenskin, or a Robe of the Magi. Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack, nor does the attack speed bonus from multiple Power Treads.
63.attrib:
+ 50 Movement Speed
+ 8 Selected Attribute
+ 30 Attack Speed
63.lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.

65.desc: Active: Transmute - Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience.  Cannot be used on Ancient Creeps.
65.notes: The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
65.lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.

67.attrib:
+ 6 Intelligence
+ 10 Attack Speed
+ 15 Damage
+ 75% Mana Regeneration
67.lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.

69.attrib:
+ 10 Damage
+ 5 HP Regeneration
+ 125% Mana Regeneration
69.lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.

71.desc: Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage based on whether the equipped hero is ranged or melee.  Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a chance to block damage from creeps.
71.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
71.attrib:
MELEE BLOCK: 20
RANGED BLOCK: 10
BLOCK CHANCE: 60%
+ 6 Agility
71.lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.

73.attrib:
+ 6 Strength
+ 3 Agility
+ 3 Intelligence
+ 3 Damage
73.lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.

75.attrib:
+ 3 Strength
+ 6 Agility
+ 3 Intelligence
+ 3 Damage
75.lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.

77.attrib:
+ 3 Strength
+ 3 Agility
+ 6 Intelligence
+ 3 Damage
77.lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.

79.desc:
Active: Restore - Heals 250 HP and gives +2 armor in an area.
Passive: Mekansm Aura - Bonus HP Regen in an area.

Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.
79.notes: Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
79.attrib:
+ 5 All Attributes
+ 5 Armor
BONUS HP REGEN: 4
79.lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.

81.desc:
Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants a variety of bonuses to nearby allies. Lifesteal bonuses from Vladmir's Aura only affect melee units.

Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.
81.notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
81.attrib:
AURA LIFESTEAL: 16%
AURA BONUS DAMAGE: 15%
AURA BONUS ARMOR: 5
AURA MANA REGEN: 0.8
+ 2 HP Regeneration
81.lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.

84.desc: Fast flying creature that carries items to and from your base.  Requires Animal Courier.

86.desc: Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +2 to all nearby allied units.  Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.
86.lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.

88.desc:
Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 AoE.
Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.
88.notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
88.attrib:
+ 6 Damage
+ 1 Armor
AURA MANA REGEN: 0.65
AURA BONUS ARMOR: 2
88.lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.

90.desc:
Active: Barrier - Gives nearby friendly units a shield that blocks 400 spell damage.
Passive: Insight Aura - Gives nearby friendly units 4 health regeneration.

Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.
90.notes:
Does not affect units that have been affected by Barrier in the last 50 seconds.
Stacks multiplicatively with non-item sources of spell resistance.
90.attrib:
+ 8 HP Regeneration
+ 30% Spell Resistance
AURA REGEN: 4
90.lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.

92.desc:
Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.
Active: Soul Release - Heals HP over time for friendly units, but deals damage over time for enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected unit takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.
92.attrib:
+ 50% Mana Regeneration
+ 6 Strength
URN HEAL: 400
DURATION: 8
URN DAMAGE: 150
92.lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.

94.desc:
Passive: Regeneration Aura - Restores HP to allies in a 750 unit radius.

Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.
94.attrib:
+ 2 All Attributes
BONUS REGEN: 3
94.lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.

96.desc: Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Destroys illusions.
96.notes:
Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of 140, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
Hex disables damage block and evasion.
96.attrib:
+ 10 Strength
+ 10 Agility
+ 35 Intelligence
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
96.lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.

98.desc: Active: Soul Burn - Silences target unit for 5.0 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30.0%.
98.notes: Amplified damage is dealt at the end of the duration as magical damage.
98.attrib:
+ 25 Intelligence
+ 30 Attack Speed
+ 30 Damage
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
98.lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.

100.desc:
Active: Cyclone - A target unit is swept up in a cyclone and made invulnerable for 2.5 seconds. Cyclone can be cast on yourself. Enemy units take 50 magical damage upon landing.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple Eul's Scepters do not stack.
100.notes:
You cannot cyclone allies.
Cyclones cast on yourself go through magic immunity.
100.attrib:
+ 10 Intelligence
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
+ 40 Movement Speed
100.lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.

102.desc: Active: Force - Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.  Double click to self-cast.
102.notes:
Quick-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
102.lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.

104.desc: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.
104.attrib:
+ 13/15/17/19/21 Intelligence
+ 3 All Attributes
+ 9 Damage
BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800
CAST RANGE: 600/650/700/750/800
104.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

106.desc: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you.  Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level.  Lasts 40 seconds.
106.lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

108.desc: Passive: Ultimate Upgrade - Upgrades the ultimates of certain heroes.
108.attrib:
+ 10 All Attributes
+ 200 Health
+ 150 Mana
108.lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.

110.desc: Active: Reset Cooldowns - Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
110.attrib:
+ 5 HP Regeneration
+ 200% Mana Regeneration
+ 40 Damage
+ 6 Intelligence
110.lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.

112.desc:
Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units, and decreases armor for nearby enemies.

Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.
112.notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Assault Cuirass, Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
112.attrib:
+ 35 Attack Speed
+ 10 Armor
AURA ATTACK SPEED: 20
AURA BONUS ARMOR: 5
ARMOR REDUCTION: 5
112.lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.

114.desc:
Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second.

This ability is disabled if damage is taken from an enemy Hero or Roshan within the last 4 seconds if your hero is melee or 6 seconds if your hero is ranged.
114.attrib:
+ 40 Strength
+ 300 Health
HEALTH RESTORED: 2%
114.lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.

116.desc: Active: Avatar - Grants magic immunity.  Duration and cooldown decrease with each use.  Some Ultimate abilities are able to disable through Black King Bar.
116.notes:
Cannot be sold.
Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
116.lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.

117.desc: Passive: Reincarnation - Brings you to life with full health and mana 5.0 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 6 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears.
117.lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

119.desc:
Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that does 200 damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds.
Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces attack speed on enemies.

Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
119.notes:
The wave extends at a speed of 350 to a max size of 900.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
119.attrib:
+ 30 Intelligence
+ 15 Armor
AURA ATTACK SLOW: 40
BLAST DAMAGE: 200
BLAST MOVEMENT SLOW: 40%
BLAST SLOW DURATION: 4
119.lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.

121.desc:
Active: Pocket Suicide - Instantly commits suicide.

Passive: Bloodpact - Starts with 8 charges. Gains 1 charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge bestows 1 mana regeneration per second, reduces gold lost from death by 25, and reduces respawn time by 4 seconds. When the bearer dies, restores 500 HP + 30 HP per charge to allied units within 1675 units, then loses a third of its charges. While dead, the bearer continues to receive experience at the death location and gives 1800 unit vision there.
121.notes: Only the first Bloodstone will gain charges.
121.attrib:
+ 500 Health
+ 400 Mana
+ 9 HP Regeneration
+ 200% Mana Regeneration
121.lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.

123.desc: Passive: Spellblock - Blocks most targeted spells once every 17 seconds.
123.attrib:
+ 15 All Attributes
+ 6 HP Regeneration
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
+ 10 Damage
123.lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.

125.desc: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
125.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
125.attrib:
+ 250 Health
+ 6 HP Regeneration
BLOCK CHANCE: 80%
RANGED BLOCK: 20
MELEE BLOCK: 40
125.lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.

127.desc: Active: Damage Return - Returns any damage you take to the unit that dealt the damage.  Lasts 4.5 seconds.
127.notes:
Damage Return is calculated after reductions.
Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other Blademails.
Won't damage magic immune units.
127.attrib:
+ 22 Damage
+ 6 Armor
+ 10 Intelligence
127.lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.

129.attrib:
+ 450 Health
+ 400 Mana
+ 4 HP Regeneration
+ 100% Mana Regeneration

131.desc: Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.
131.notes: Stacks multiplicatively with non-item sources of spell resistance.
131.attrib:
+ 8 HP Regeneration
+ 30% Spell Resistance
131.lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.

133.desc: Drops on death.  Divine Rapier is muted to anyone but the owner, as long as he or his teammates pick it up. As soon as an enemy picks it up, Divine Rapier is unmuted, but cannot be dropped except on death.
133.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.

135.desc:
Passive: Mini-Bash - Gives a chance to minibash and deal bonus damage.
Passive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing.
135.attrib:
+ 88 Damage
+ 15 Attack Speed
CHANCE TO MINI-BASH: 35%
MINI-BASH DAMAGE: 100
135.lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.

137.desc:
Active: Toggles Burn Damage on or off.
Passive: Burn Damage - Deals damage per second in a 700 radius.
137.attrib:
+ 65 Damage
BURN DAMAGE PER SECOND: 50
137.lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.

139.notes: Doesn't stack with other sources of Evasion.
139.attrib:
+ 30 Agility
+ 30 Damage
+ 35% Evasion
+ 30 Attack Speed
139.lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.

141.desc: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.
141.attrib:
+ 81 Damage
CRITICAL CHANCE: 25%
CRITICAL DAMAGE: 240%
141.lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.

143.desc: Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.
143.notes: Doesn't stack with other sources of bash.
143.attrib:
+ 40 Damage
+ 6 Strength
MELEE CHANCE: 25%
RANGED CHANCE: 10%
143.lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.

145.desc: Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a 250 AoE around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.
145.notes:
Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
Cleave damage goes through magic immunity.
145.attrib:
+ 65 Damage
+ 6 HP Regeneration
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
CLEAVE DAMAGE: 35%
145.lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.

147.desc:
Active: Mirror Image - Creates 2 illusions of your hero that last 20 seconds.

Melee illusions deal 33% damage and take 250% bonus damage. Ranged illusions deal 28% damage and take 300% bonus damage.

Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
147.notes:
Has a 0.1 second cast time upon which you are invulnerable.
Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
147.attrib:
+ 10 Strength
+ 26 Agility
+ 10 Intelligence
+ 15 Attack Speed
+ 10% Movement Speed
147.lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.

149.desc: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.
149.attrib:
+ 30 Damage
CRITICAL CHANCE: 20%
CRITICAL DAMAGE: 175%
149.lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.

151.desc: Active: Unholy Strength - Gives +31 damage, +10 attack speed, and +25 strength while active, but drains 40 HP per second.  You cannot die from the health loss when the bonus strength is gone, or the health drain per second.
151.notes:
Activation has a 2 second cooldown.
The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.
151.attrib:
+ 9 Damage
+ 15 Attack Speed
+ 5 Armor
+ 7 HP Regeneration
151.lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.

152.desc: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units.  If attacking to break the invisibility, you gain 150 bonus damage on that attack.  Lasts 17 seconds.
152.notes:
Has a 0.3 second fade time.
If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
152.lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.

154.desc:
Passive: Greater Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 5.0 seconds.

Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
154.attrib:
MAIM CHANCE: 16%
MAIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 32%
MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 32
+ 16 Damage
+ 16 Strength
+ 16 Agility
+ 16 Attack Speed
+ 16% Movement Speed
154.lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.

156.desc:
Active: Unholy Rage - Increases Lifesteal by 175% for 3.5 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives Lifesteal on attacks.

Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.
156.attrib:
+ 20 Damage
+ 25 Strength
+ 5 Armor
LIFESTEAL: 25%
156.lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.

158.desc:
Active: Static Charge - Places a charged shield on a target unit which has a 20% chance to release a shocking bolt at a nearby attacker and 4 additional enemies.
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits 8 targets, dealing damage.

Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
158.notes:
Static Charge cannot trigger more than once per second.
Static Charge's shock deals magical damage centered on Hero with the Static Charge. Static Charge's targets cannot be more than 900 range away.
158.attrib:
+ 24 Damage
+ 80 Attack Speed
STATIC DURATION: 15
STATIC CHANCE: 20%
STATIC DAMAGE: 200
CHAIN CHANCE: 25%
CHAIN DAMAGE: 150
158.lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.

160.desc:
Passive: Cold Attack - Attacks slow the movement and attack speed of the target.

Eye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers. Eye of Skadi can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.
160.notes: Lasts 5 seconds with melee Eye of Skadi, 3 seconds with ranged Eye of Skadi.
160.attrib:
+ 25 All Attributes
+ 250 Health
+ 250 Mana
MOVE SLOW: 35%
ATTACK SLOW: 35
160.lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.

162.desc: Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds.
162.attrib:
MAIM CHANCE: 15%
MAIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%
MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 20
+ 10 Damage
+ 16 Strength
162.lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.

164.desc:
Active: Dominate - Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit.
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks.

Helm of the Dominator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
164.notes: Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time.  If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
164.attrib:
+ 20 Damage
+ 5 Armor
LIFESTEAL: 15%
164.lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.

166.desc:
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits 4 targets, dealing damage.

Maelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.
166.attrib:
+ 24 Damage
+ 25 Attack Speed
CHANCE TO CHAIN: 25%
CHAIN DAMAGE: 120
166.lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

168.desc:
Passive: Corruption - Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.

Desolator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
168.lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.

170.desc: Yasha-based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.
170.attrib:
+ 16 Agility
+ 15 Attack Speed
+ 10% Movement Speed
170.lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.

172.desc:
Active: Berserk - Gives 100 attack speed and 30% movement speed but causes you to take extra 30% damage. Lasts 12 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Grants lifesteal on attacks.

Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
172.lore: Once this mask is worn, its bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.

174.desc:
Active: Purge - Purges a target unit, removing buffs, slowing, and dealing damage if it is a summoned unit.
Passive: Feedback - Your attacks burn 20/36 mana and deal the same amount in physical damage. Upgradable.

Diffusal Blade is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
174.notes:
Instantly kills summoned units.
Slow lasts 4 seconds.
174.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

176.desc: Active: Ether Blast - Converts you and your target into ethereal form, increasing incoming magic damage. Target unit is slowed and cannot attack or be attacked, and takes 2.0x of your primary attribute + 75 as damage.
176.notes:
Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter.
Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage.
Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
176.attrib:
+ 40 Agility
+ 10 Strength
+ 10 Intelligence
BLAST ENEMY DURATION: 3
BLAST ALLY/SELF DURATION: 4
INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 40%
176.lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.

178.desc: Active: Sacrifice - Consume 150 HP to temporarily gain 150 Mana.  Lasts 10 seconds.
178.notes: If the mana gain cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that is used before your mana pool.  If this mana is not used before the duration, the extra mana is lost.
178.attrib:
+ 3 HP Regeneration
+ 50% Mana Regeneration
178.lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those around it.

180.desc:
Active: Replenish Mana - Restores mana in an area around the hero.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.
180.notes: Does not work on Meepo clones.
180.attrib:
+ 55 Movement Speed
+ 250 Mana
MANA RESTORED: 135
180.lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.

181.desc:
Passive: Poison Attack - Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing, depending on whether your hero is melee or ranged.

Orb of Venom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers. Orb of Venom can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.
181.attrib:
MELEE SLOW: 12%
RANGED SLOW: 4%
DURATION: 4
POISON DAMAGE: 3
181.lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.

182.desc: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage based on whether the equipped hero is melee or ranged.
182.notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
182.attrib:
MELEE BLOCK: 20
RANGED BLOCK: 10
BLOCK CHANCE: 60%
182.lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.

185.desc:
Active: Endurance - Gives bonus +10 attack speed and +10% movement speed to surrounding allies.
Passive: Swiftness Aura - Gives bonus attack and movement speed to surrounding allies.

Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.
185.attrib:
+ 9 All Attributes
+ 3 Damage
AURA ATTACK SPEED: 5
AURA MOVE SPEED: 5%
185.lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.

187.desc: Active: Valor - Reduces the armor of you and your target. Lasts 7 seconds.
187.attrib:
+ 6 Armor
+ 50% Mana Regeneration
ARMOR REDUCTION: 6
187.lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.

188.desc: Use: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisiblity and bonus movement speed for a brief time.  Minimap icons will also be hidden.  Upon moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, the invisibility is lost.

190.desc: Active: Magic Weakness - Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts 25.0 seconds.
190.attrib:
+ 6 HP Regeneration
+ 6 All Attributes
+ 6 Damage
+ 6 Armor
MAGIC WEAKNESS RADIUS: 600
MAGIC WEAKNESS DURATION: 25
INCREASED MAGIC DAMAGE: 25%

193.desc: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you.  Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level.  Lasts 40 seconds.
193.lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

194.desc: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you.  Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level.  Lasts 40 seconds.
194.lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.

196.desc:
Active: Purge - Purges a target unit, removing buffs, slowing, and dealing damage if it is a summoned unit.
Passive: Feedback - Your attacks burn 20/36 mana and deal the same amount in physical damage. Upgradable.

Diffusal Blade is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
196.notes:
Instantly kills summoned units.
Slow lasts 4 seconds.
196.lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.

201.desc: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.
201.attrib:
+ 13/15/17/19/21 Intelligence
+ 3 All Attributes
+ 9 Damage
BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800
CAST RANGE: 600/650/700/750/800
201.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

202.desc: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.
202.attrib:
+ 13/15/17/19/21 Intelligence
+ 3 All Attributes
+ 9 Damage
BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800
CAST RANGE: 600/650/700/750/800
202.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

203.desc: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.
203.attrib:
+ 13/15/17/19/21 Intelligence
+ 3 All Attributes
+ 9 Damage
BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800
CAST RANGE: 600/650/700/750/800
203.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

204.desc: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.
204.attrib:
+ 13/15/17/19/21 Intelligence
+ 3 All Attributes
+ 9 Damage
BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800
CAST RANGE: 600/650/700/750/800
204.lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.

206.desc: Active: Cripple - Slows the target's movement speed.
206.attrib:
+ 25 Intelligence
+ 350 Health
CRIPPLE SLOW: 60%
DURATION: 4
206.lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.

208.desc: Active: Stun a target enemy unit for 2.0 seconds. Goes through Magic Immunity. Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.
208.notes:
The stun is melee range.
Doesn't stack with other bashes.
208.attrib:
+ 100 Damage
+ 10 Strength
MELEE CHANCE: 25%
RANGED CHANCE: 10%
208.lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.

210.desc:
Active: Disarms the target for 4.5 seconds. Lasts 3.0 on Melee targets.
Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds.
210.notes: The disarm effect cannot be purged.
210.attrib:
+ 25% Evasion
MAIM CHANCE: 15%
MAIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%
MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 20
+ 25 Damage
+ 20 Strength
210.lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.

212.desc:
Passive: Aquila Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 AoE.
Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.
212.notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
212.attrib:
+ 9 Damage
+ 3 Strength
+ 9 Agility
+ 3 Intelligence
+ 1 Armor
AURA MANA REGEN: 0.65
AURA BONUS ARMOR: 2
212.lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.

214.desc: Passive: Break - Whenever you attack or get attacked you lose the HP regeneration and 30 Movement Speed for 13 seconds.
214.attrib:
+ 90 Movement Speed
+ 4 Armor
+ 12 HP Regeneration
214.lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.

215.desc: Active: Fade - Grants invisibility to you or target allied hero over 1.5 seconds. Moving breaks the invisibility. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

216.desc: Use: Eat the candy to gain a permanent bonus to your stats, equal to your hero's natural stat gain.  Greevil Treats also give 500 XP.
216.lore: A strange looking candy, made out of Greevil cream and gummy vitamins.

217.desc: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target point.

218.desc: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target point.

219.desc: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target enemy unit.

220.desc: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target unit.

221.desc: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target point.

226.desc: Drops on death.  Cursed Rapier is muted to anyone but the owner, as long as he or his teammates pick it up. As soon as an enemy picks it up, Cursed Rapier is unmuted, but cannot be dropped except on death.  Cursed Rapier gives vision of its bearer to all enemy heroes  Each time Cursed Rapier gets a kill for its owner, it loses 100 damage.
226.lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
